short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip tracks with the keyboard! Just use CMD/CTRL + RightArrow/LeftArrow to skip forwards/backwards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip tracks on SoundCloud.com using your keyboard the way you'd expect. Unlike SoundCloud's default controls, which require the use of the Shift key, this Chrome extension allows you to use the more intuitive CMD/CTRL + RightArrow/LeftArrow keyboard shortcuts to skip forwards/backwards.
